mapper.sql: s.id,s.uid, s.code,s.order_id,s.order_code, s.client_id, s.car_no, s.in_date,s.out_date, s.cr_date, s.flag,s.rental,s.source_id, c.code client_code, c.cname
mapper.select:
select
from t_stock_in s, t_client c where s.client_id=c.id and s.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from t_stock_in s,t_client c where s.client_id=c.id and s.flag>=0
and (c.cname like concat('%',#{key},'%') or s.order_code like concat('%',#{key},'%'))
and s.in_date BETWEEN #{sdate} and #{edate}'

select s.id,s.uid,s.code,s.order_code,s.client_id, c.code client_code,c.cname,s.car_no,s.in_date,s.out_date,s.flag,ifnull(sid.rental,0) rental,s.source_id from t_stock_in s inner join t_client c on s.client_id=c.id left join (select bill_id,sum(rental) rental from t_stock_in_detail GROUP BY bill_id) sid on s.id=sid.bill_id where s.flag>=0
and s.order_id=#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from (select t.order_code from (select si.id,si.order_id,si.order_code,c.code client_code,c.cname client_name,o.cargo_name,sid.num,sid.vol,si.income,si.pay from t_stock_in_detail sid INNER JOIN (select a.id,a.order_id,a.order_code,b.income,b.pay from t_stock_in a LEFT JOIN (select bill_id,sum(amount) income,sum(pay) pay from t_fee where ftype=1 GROUP BY bill_id) b on a.id=b.bill_id where a.flag>=0) si on sid.bill_id=si.id INNER JOIN t_order o on si.order_id=o.id INNER JOIN t_client c on o.client_id=c.id) t
t.order_code like concat('%',#{key},'%') or t.client_code like concat('%',#{key},'%') or t.client_name like concat('%',#{key},'%')
GROUP BY t.order_code ) tt

select t.order_id,t.order_code,t.client_code,t.client_name,t.cargo_name,IFNULL(sum(t.num),0) total_num,IFNULL(sum(t.vol),0) total_vol,sum(t.rental) total_rental,IFNULL(t.income,0) income,IFNULL(t.pay,0) pay from (select si.id,si.order_id,si.order_code,sid.rental,c.code client_code,c.cname client_name,o.cargo_name,sid.num,sid.vol,si.income,si.pay from t_stock_in_detail sid INNER JOIN (select a.id,a.order_id,a.order_code,a.rental,b.income,b.pay from t_stock_in a LEFT JOIN (select bill_id,sum(amount) income,sum(pay) pay from t_fee where ftype=1 GROUP BY bill_id) b on a.id=b.bill_id where a.flag>=0) si on sid.bill_id=si.id INNER JOIN t_order o on si.order_id=o.id INNER JOIN t_client c on o.client_id=c.id) t
t.order_code like concat('%',#{key},'%') or t.client_code like concat('%',#{key},'%') or t.client_name like concat('%',#{key},'%')
GROUP BY t.order_code order by t.order_id desc
limit #{page.start},#{page.end}
mapper.insert: insert into t_stock_in ( uid,code, order_id,order_code,client_id, car_no, in_date, cr_date, flag) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},GetStockInCode(), #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into t_stock_in
id,
code,
client_id,
car_no,
in_date,
cr_date,
flag,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update t_stock_in
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_stock_in set client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
